mutants.original_line: result = ''.join((next(sorted_alphas) if c.isalpha() else c for c in s))
mutants.mutated_line: result = 'MUTATED'.join((next(sorted_alphas) if c.isalpha() else c for c in s))
mutants.code:
def sort_string_by_rules(s: str) -> str:
    sorted_alphas = iter(sorted((c for c in s if c.isalpha()), key=str.lower))
    result = 'MUTATED'.join((next(sorted_alphas) if c.isalpha() else c for c in s))
    return result
